scripts.clean: find -name node_modules | xargs rm -rf && find -name dist | xargs rm -rf
scripts.install-dev: concurrently "npm install --prefix auth-service" "npm install --prefix user-service" "npm install --prefix singer-service" "npm install --prefix vote-service"  "npm install --prefix api-gateway" "npm install --prefix shared"
scripts.ci: concurrently "npm ci --prefix auth-service" "npm ci --prefix user-service" "npm ci --prefix singer-service" "npm ci --prefix vote-service" "npm ci --prefix api-gateway" "npm ci --prefix shared"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix auth-service" "npm run dev --prefix user-service" "npm run dev --prefix singer-service" "npm run dev --prefix vote-service" "npm run dev --prefix api-gateway"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix auth-service" "npm run build --prefix user-service" "npm run build --prefix singer-service" "npm run build --prefix vote-service" "npm run build --prefix api-gateway"
scripts.clean-mac: find . -type d -name 'node_modules' -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -type d -name 'dist' -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test --prefix auth-service" "npm run test --prefix user-service" "npm run test --prefix singer-service" "npm run test --prefix vote-service" "npm run test --prefix stats-service"
